The '''Goldworthy family''' was a (probably well-to-do<ref>[[Robert Foster]], ''[[The Complete Guide to Middle-earth]]''</ref>) [[Hobbit]] family. [[Hanna Goldworthy]] married [[Madoc Brandybuck]].<ref>{{App|Brandybuck}}</ref>
